title: WH40k Storm of Vengeance v1.3 Android
description:
WH40k: Storm of Vengeance v1.3
Requirements: Android O/S : 4.1+
Overview: Warhammer 40,000: Storm of Vengeance is a lane strategy game for PC and mobile devices set in the dark, gothic universe of Warhammer 40,000!
Image

Storm of Vengeance tells the story of a pivotal moment in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, during the legendary planetary conflict on Piscina IV. Featuring two of Games Workshop's most cherished characters, Grand Master Belial and Ork Warlord Ghazghkull Thraka, Storm of Vengeance offers the player the chance to command the tenacious defence of the planet with only 100 Dark Angel Space Marines, or attempt it's annihilation using the cunning of the Ork Waaagh! and their telly-porta technology.

Features:
Unique compelling blend of resource management, unit construction and combat
50+ missions per faction
In depth skill tree for each faction
Powerful skills and abilities tailored for each faction
Simultaneous cross platform multiplayer (Android, iOS & PC)
Exclusive dynamic soundtrack capturing the rich atmosphere of the Warhammer 40,000 universe

What's new in this version : (Updated : May 23, 2014)
Fixed a bug with Ork campaign allowing you to spam abilities when you didn't own a weirdboy tower
Fixed a bug when Ork vs Ork in the campaign would cause the enemy command abilities to put yours on cooldown
Fixed a bug with Ork weird boy towers showing the upgrade button
Fixed a bug with Scion troops consistently dieing when they were deployed at the very start of the lane
Moved Terminator/Dreadnought command icon to Rhino/Stormraven
General bug fixes and visual improvements

This app has no advertisements
